RequirementsÔÉÅ

The code is developped on Debian 12 with Python 3.11.7.

In addition to Python, you need to install the following packages:

  • NumPy: Fundamental package for numerical computing in Python.

  • Pandas: Data analysis and manipulation tool.

  • PyArrow: Arrow manages data in arrays (pyarrow.Array).

  • SciPy: A library for scientific and technical computing, offering algorithms for optimization, integration, interpolation, and more.

  • Matplotlib: Visualization library for creating static, animated, and interactive plots.

  • tqdm: Library for displaying progress bars in loops and scripts.
